text: mbɨ hanɨhan mɨŋam ekwaŋg ŋandari amar. Wɨram mbanamb isupɨr mbanaŋ ñi han, Yakŋ Ohɨrav ndɨn hanɨhan han 100 emamp eŋgwandari amar. Ave mbɨ oram akŋ azɨŋunj namunj yaŋunj nornanch war akŋ ŋandari amar. Hanez wɨram emŋgemŋga hamb ndɨn enta kɨvah sɨndɨramŋgi amar. Kɨrɨm njɨmɨnj mbɨ kɨpɨr icha ipɨra ñɨñɨnd han ŋaŋ ñɨndari amar.
